Uses of Interface
org.strongback.components.Switch

  • Packages that use Switch 
    Package Description
    org.strongback  
    org.strongback.components
    This package defines a set of components that mirror real actuator, sensors, and other devices.
    org.strongback.components.ui  
    org.strongback.hardware  

    • Uses of Switch in org.strongback

      Methods in org.strongback with parameters of type Switch 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SwitchReactor.onTriggered(Switch swtch, Runnable function)
      Register a Runnable function that is to be called the moment when the specified Switch is triggered.
      default void SwitchReactor.onTriggeredSubmit(Switch swtch, Supplier<Command> commandSupplier)
      Submit a Command the moment when the specified Switch is triggered.
      void SwitchReactor.onUntriggered(Switch swtch, Runnable function)
      Register a Runnable function that is to be called the moment when the specified Switch is untriggered.
      default void SwitchReactor.onUntriggeredSubmit(Switch swtch, Supplier<Command> commandSupplier)
      Submit a Command the moment when the specified Switch is untriggered.
      DataRecorder DataRecorder.register(String name, Switch swtch)
      Registers by name a switch that will be periodically polled to obtain and record the switch state.
      void SwitchReactor.whileTriggered(Switch swtch, Runnable function)
      Register a Runnable function to be called repeatedly whenever the specified Switch is in the triggered state.
      void SwitchReactor.whileUntriggered(Switch swtch, Runnable function)
      Register a Runnable function to be called repeatedly whenever the specified Switch is not in the triggered state.

    • Uses of Switch in org.strongback.components

      Subinterfaces of Switch in org.strongback.components 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Fuse
      A switch that is initially not triggered but that can be (manually or automatically) reset.
      Methods in org.strongback.components that return Switch 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Switch Switch.alwaysTriggered()
      Create a switch that is always triggered.
      static Switch Switch.and(Switch switch1, Switch switch2)
      Return a new switch that is only triggered when both switches are triggered.
      Switch PneumaticsModule.compressorRunningSwitch()
      Get the switch that reports whether the compressor is running.
      Switch PneumaticsModule.Faults.currentTooHigh()
      The switch that is triggered when the compressor current is too high.
      Switch TalonSRX.Faults.forwardLimitSwitch()
      The switch that is triggered when the forward limit switch fault is tripped.
      Switch TalonSRX.Faults.forwardSoftLimit()
      The switch that is triggered when the forward soft limit is tripped.
      Switch LimitedMotor.getForwardLimitSwitch()
      Get the switch that signals when this motor reaches its limit in the forward direction.
      Switch LimitedMotor.getReverseLimitSwitch()
      Get the switch that signals when this motor reaches its limit in the reverse direction.
      Switch TalonSRX.Faults.hardwareFailure()
      The switch that is triggered when a hardware fault occurs.
      Switch PneumaticsModule.lowPressureSwitch()
      Get the switch that reports whether the pressure is below the lower threshold.
      static Switch Switch.neverTriggered()
      Create a switch that is never triggered.
      Switch PneumaticsModule.Faults.notConnected()
      The switch that is triggered when the compressor is not connected.
      static Switch Switch.or(Switch switch1, Switch switch2)
      Return a new switch that is only triggered when either switch is triggered.
      Switch TalonSRX.Faults.overTemperature()
      The switch that is triggered when the Talon's over-temperature fault is tripped.
      Switch TalonSRX.Faults.reverseLimitSwitch()
      The switch that is triggered when the reverse limit switch fault is tripped.
      Switch TalonSRX.Faults.reverseSoftLimit()
      The switch that is triggered when the reverse soft limit is tripped.
      Switch PneumaticsModule.Faults.shorted()
      The switch that is triggered when the compressor is not running because it is shorted.
      Switch TalonSRX.Faults.underVoltage()
      The switch that is triggered when the voltage is too low.

    • Uses of Switch in org.strongback.hardware

      Methods in org.strongback.hardware that return Switch 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Switch Hardware.Switches.analog(int channel, double lowerVoltage, double upperVoltage, Hardware.Switches.AnalogOption option, Hardware.Switches.TriggerMode mode)
      Create an analog switch sensor that is triggered when the value exceeds the specified upper voltage and that is no longer triggered when the value drops below the specified lower voltage.
      static Switch Hardware.Switches.normallyClosed(int channel)
      Create a generic normally closed digital switch sensor on the specified digital channel.
      static Switch Hardware.Switches.normallyOpen(int channel)
      Create a generic normally open digital switch sensor on the specified digital channel.
